alert.note: Alert for Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Jemez Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 3:32PM MDT until March 17 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Jemez Mountains and Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-25 east of Santa Fe at Glorieta Pass. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Jemez Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
